text: braqhmaqvAqdinO# vadanti viqcityaqH sOmA(3) na viqcityA(3) itiq sOmOq vA OSha#dhInAq(gm)q rAjAq tasmiqnaq. yadApa#nnaM grasiqtamEqvAsyaq tad-yad-vi#cinuqyAd-yathAq &&syA$dgrasiqtaM ni#ShKiqdati# tAqdRugEqva tadyanna vi#cinuqyAd-yathAq &kShannApa#nnaM ~MviqdhAva#ti tAqdRugEqva tat kShOdhu#kO &ddhvaqryuH syAt kShOdhu#kOq yaja#mAnaqH sOma#vikrayiqnth sOma(gm)# SOdhaqyEtyEqva brU#yAqd yadIta#raqM - [  ] 59
